data: `minecraft:behavior.play_dead` allows the mob to play dead when attacked by other entities. When playing dead, other entities will not target this mob.

data.Name: apply_regeneration
data.Description: Whether the mob will receive the regeneration effect while playing dead.

data.Name: damage_sources
data.Description: The list of Entity Damage Sources that will cause this mob to play dead.

data.Name: duration
data.Description: The amount of time the mob will remain playing dead (in seconds).

data.Name: filters
data.Description: The list of other triggers that are required for the mob to activate play dead

data.Name: force_below_health
data.Description: The amount of health at which damage will cause the mob to play dead.

data.Name: random_damage_range
data.Description: The range of damage that may cause the goal to start depending on randomness. Damage taken below the min will never cause the goal to start. Damage taken above the max will always cause the goal to start.

data.Name: random_start_chance
data.Description: The likelihood of this goal starting upon taking damage.
